projects.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{project}"? The entire folder will be removed permanently.

new_project.title: Create New Project
new_project.youtube_helper: The video will be downloaded with yt-dlp into an MKV container.
new_project.restore_helper: Upload the previously downloaded project backup; the system restores the full folder into workdir.
new_project.subtitle_suffix_helper: Format: underscore plus a two-letter language code (e.g. _hu or _en). The saved subtitle name will be the video base name plus this suffix.

project_list.title: Project list:
project_list.body: Use the table on the left to browse existing projects. Click the name to open the workflow, or delete it permanently with the "Delete" button.

new_project.title: Creating a new project:
new_project.body: Enter a project name, then pick the source via the tabs. Choose a local file for uploads, or paste the full https:// link for YouTube downloads.

upload_status.title: Upload status:
upload_status.body: When uploading a video the progress bar shows speed and size; for YouTube links the download starts automatically and the status updates once conversion finishes.

subtitles.title: Subtitles:
subtitles.body: Optionally upload a .srt file. Provide a suffix like `_hu` so the system can append it to the video name.

theme.title: Theme & palette:
theme.body: Use the top-right controls to switch between light/dark and open the theme color editor to customize the entire UI.

uploads.youtube_in_progress: Downloading YouTube video and converting to MKV…

errors.restore_required: Choose a previously downloaded backup file.
errors.subtitle_suffix_required: Add a subtitle suffix (e.g. _hu) when uploading subtitles.
errors.subtitle_suffix_format: Subtitle suffix must be underscore + two letters (e.g. _hu).
